name: KSU dark D2L (updated)
description: A dark theme for Kennesaw State University's D2L page, as well as OwlExpress. continued from https://userstyles.org/styles/119760
additional_info:
1.0.8 (8/26/18)
- more fixes from brightspace layout
1.0.7
- fixed some issues caused by the layout change, as well as tidied up a few areas

1.0.6
- fixed some things on d2l, most notably progress summary page
1.0.5
- themed most of kennesaw.edu and some subdomains, namely registrar.kennesaw.edu
    - will fix more sites as I realize they're broken
- fixed multiple borders around content in d2l, and fixed missing file icons in d2l
1.0.4
-finished making DegreeWorks dark
-also made the Unused/Split/Repeated/etc sections a little bit neater

1.0.3
-began theming DegreeWorks 
-so far, basically just made the background behind completed courses a more noticeable green

1.0.2
-fixed some black text on dark background in OwlExpress
-slightly changed tabs (ie Main Menu, Financial Aid, etc) on OwlExpress

1.0.1
-fixed white submitted files
-fixed white Agenda calendar view

1.0.0 - initial release
- fixed a bunch of sections within d2l
- email, quizzes, and calendars among others
- began theming OwlExpress, still a work in progress, some areas may still have black text on a black background
- also adds a basic dark theme to the page that displays when D2L is down for maintenance
